pullRequest.title: [openwebnet] Fixed handling of ZigBee USB gateway and devices
pullRequest.bodyText:
BREAKING CHANGE Configuration for OpenWebNet ZigBee devices has changed, see the binding README for the current configuration of the 'where' parameter for Zigbee (radio) devices and examples. Existing things configuration should be updated.

This PR is a backport of main-#9076 (already merged) to 2.5.x.

[openwebnet] Fixed config, handling and discovery of ZigBee devices (fixes #8915 and fixes #8917). Added test for ownID. Now uses openwebnet4j v0.3.2
[openwebnet] ZigBee: improved handling of wrong 'where' parameter. Updated README. Improved logging.
[openwebnet] Improved discoveryByActivation to distinguish dimmers from lights. Now using openwebnet4j 0.3.2-1

commit.message:
[openwebnet] Fixed handling of ZigBee USB gateway and devices (fixes #8915 #8917 #8962)
Backport of main-#9076 to 2.5.x
* [openwebnet] Fixed config, handling and discovery of ZigBee devices (fixes #8915 and fixes #8917). Added test for ownID. Now uses openwebnet4j v0.3.2
* [openwebnet] ZigBee: improved handling of wrong 'where' parameter. Updated README. Improved logging.
* [openwebnet] Improved discoveryByActivation to distinguish dimmers from lights. Now using openwebnet4j 0.3.2-1

Signed-off-by: Massimo Valla <mvcode00@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: Why did you change this? Logging to info should be used sparsely e.g. a newly started component or a user file that has been loaded. Same for below.

commit.message:
[openwebnet] Improved logging info>warn

Signed-off-by: Massimo Valla <mvcode00@gmail.com>
